meanings.definition: Alone in a category or class; sole
meanings.sent1: The red apple was the only one left on the tree.
meanings.sent2: She was the only student in the class who knew the answer.
meanings.sent3: The lonely puppy was the only one without a playmate.
meanings.sent4: The lighthouse stood as the only beacon of hope in the storm.
meanings.sent5: The diamond was the only gem that sparkled in the dark cave.

meanings.definition: Without others or anything further; exclusively
meanings.sent1: She could only play with her toys in her room.
meanings.sent2: The store only sells organic fruits and vegetables.
meanings.sent3: He could only wear his superhero cape on weekends.
meanings.sent4: The magician could only perform his tricks in the evening.
meanings.sent5: The restaurant only serves breakfast until 11 AM.

meanings.sent1: I only have one cookie left in the jar.
meanings.sent2: He can only stay for a few minutes before he has to leave.
meanings.sent3: She can only watch one episode of her favorite show tonight.
meanings.sent4: The teacher will only accept the homework if it's turned in on time.
meanings.sent5: The bus will only wait for a few more seconds before departing.

meanings.sent1: She only wanted a small piece of cake for dessert.
meanings.sent2: He only needed a few more minutes to finish his work.
meanings.sent3: The cat only meowed once before falling asleep.
meanings.sent4: The flower only bloomed for a short period in the spring.
meanings.sent5: The book only had a few pages left to read before it was finished.
